show.title: Hidden Love Surges
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/xLDfsx
show.description: A young woman learns the man she deeply loved is about to marry someone else. Unable to bear the pain, she decides to express the love she never dared to reveal one last time. Overcoming her fears, she reaches his wedding, unshaken. As the auspicious instruments play and the hall buzzes with celebration, she stands before him and pours out the love buried deep in her heart. This is her final attempt… a last journey to touch his heart, to reclaim her love.
